org.wise.portal.service.acl.impl

Class AclServiceImpl<T extends Persistable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wise.portal.service.acl.impl.AclServiceImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.aop.framework.AopInfrastructureBean, org.springframework.security.access.PermissionEvaluator, AclService<T>

    public class AclServiceImpl<T extends Persistable>
extends Object
implements AclService<T>
    A class which allows creation of access control lists for any object.
    Author:
    Laurel Williams

      • addPermission

        public void addPermission(T object,
                          org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission)
        Description copied from interface: AclService
        Creates an acl for an object if neccessary and adds an ace for that object with the permission specified. This adds the permission to the currently-logged-in user
        Specified by:
        addPermission in interface AclService<T extends Persistable>
        Parameters:
        object - The object for which the acl and ace are to be created.
        permission - The permission to grant to the user on the object.
        See Also:
        AclService.addPermission(Object, Permission)

      • addPermission

        public void addPermission(T object,
                          org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission,
                          User user)
        Description copied from interface: AclService
        Creates an acl for an object if neccessary and adds an ace for that object with the permission specified for the specified user
        Specified by:
        addPermission in interface AclService<T extends Persistable>
        Parameters:
        object - The object for which the acl and ace are to be created.
        permission - The permission to grant to the user on the object.
        user - A User who will be granted the permission on the object.
        See Also:
        AclService.addPermission(Object, Permission, User)

      • removePermission

        public void removePermission(T object,
                             org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission,
                             User user)
        Description copied from interface: AclService
        Removes the permission of a user on an object. If the object does not have an acl or if the ace does not exist for the object, do nothing.
        Specified by:
        removePermission in interface AclService<T extends Persistable>
        Parameters:
        object - The object for which the permission is to be removed.
        permission - The permission to remove from the user on the object.
        user - The User who will lose the permission on the object.
        See Also:
        AclService.removePermission(Object, Permission, User)
